# Interface SpeechChunkStreamIterationResult

Interface representing the result of a SpeechChunkStream iteration.

interface SpeechChunkStreamIterationResult {  
audio?: number[];  
done: boolean;  
phonemeTimestamps?: [PhonemeTimestamp](./common_stream_speech_chunk.PhonemeTimestamp)[];  
}

##### Index

### Properties

audio? done phonemeTimestamps?

## Properties

### `Optional`audio

audio?: number[]

Raw audio data

### done

done: boolean

Indicates if the stream is finished

### `Optional`phonemeTimestamps

phonemeTimestamps?: [PhonemeTimestamp](./common_stream_speech_chunk.PhonemeTimestamp)[]

Optional phoneme timing information
